summary.span: 获取或设置远程处理应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a remoting application.

value.span: 远程处理应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of a remoting application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过当前的属性或通过配置文件，可以一次设置应用程序名称。An application name can be set only once, either through the current property or through a configuration file. 如果应用程序运行在托管环境中，如 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 中，此值可能已设置 （通常为的虚拟目录）。If an application is running inside a hosted environment, such as Internet Information Services (IIS), this value might have already been set (usually to the virtual directory). 当前的属性将返回`null`如果尚未设置应用程序名称。The current property will return `null` if the application name has not been set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性以指示远程处理应用程序的名称。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to indicate the name of the remoting application. 完整的示例代码中，请参阅示例和方法。For the full example code, see examples for the and methods. [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/CS/server.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/VB/server.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何从命名的应用程序访问进行远程处理的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to access an object remoted from a named application. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 已过时。 is obsolete. 请改用 。Please use instead. 传递`null`作为`filename`参数将导致默认远程处理初始化，而无需配置文件是否存在。Passing `null` as the `filename` parameter will cause default remoting initialization without requiring the existence of a configuration file. 有关配置文件语法的信息，请参阅[远程处理设置架构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e)。For configuration file syntax, see [Remoting Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e). > [!NOTE] > 由引用封送的对象 (Mbr) 不是驻留在内存永久。Marshal-by-reference objects (MBRs) do not reside in memory forever. 相反，除非类型替代若要控制其自己的生存期策略，每个 MBR 都具有有限的生存时间之前的.NET Framework 远程处理系统开始的过程中删除它并回收内存。Instead, unless the type overrides to control its own lifetime policies, each MBR has a finite lifetime before the .NET Framework remoting system begins the process of deleting it and reclaiming the memory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[生存期租约](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c72d561c-1266-4c8b-b258-2c168c08da9a)。For more information, see [Lifetime Leases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c72d561c-1266-4c8b-b258-2c168c08da9a). ## Examples [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client/CPP/remotingconfiguration_configure_server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client/CS/remotingconfiguration_configure_server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client/VB/remotingconfiguration_configure_server.vb#1)]

summary.span: 读取配置文件并配置远程处理结构。

span.span: Reads the configuration file and configures the remoting infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递`null`作为`filename`参数将导致默认远程处理初始化，而无需配置文件是否存在。Passing `null` as the `filename` parameter will cause default remoting initialization without requiring the existence of a configuration file. 有关远程处理和安全性的详细信息请参阅[远程处理中的安全。](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9574262c-d4b1-41c5-8600-24ff147c0add)For more information about remoting and security see [Security in Remoting.](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9574262c-d4b1-41c5-8600-24ff147c0add) 有关配置文件语法的信息，请参阅[远程处理设置架构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e)。For configuration file syntax, see [Remoting Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e). > [!NOTE] > 由引用封送的对象 (Mbr) 不是驻留在内存永久。Marshal-by-reference objects (MBRs) do not reside in memory forever. 相反，除非类型替代若要控制其自己的生存期策略，每个 MBR 都具有有限的生存时间之前的.NET Framework 远程处理系统开始的过程中删除它并回收内存。Instead, unless the type overrides to control its own lifetime policies, each MBR has a finite lifetime before the .NET Framework remoting system begins the process of deleting it and reclaiming the memory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[生存期租约](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c72d561c-1266-4c8b-b258-2c168c08da9a)。For more information, see [Lifetime Leases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c72d561c-1266-4c8b-b258-2c168c08da9a).

summary.span: 指示此应用程序域中的服务器信道是向本地或远程调用方返回经过筛选的异常信息，还是返回完整的异常信息。

span.span: Indicates whether the server channels in this application domain return filtered or complete exception information to local or remote callers.

returns.span: 如果只将筛选过的异常信息返回给本地调用方或远程调用方（具体返回给哪些调用方由 参数指定），则为 ；如果返回完整的异常信息，则为 。

span.span: if only filtered exception information is returned to local or remote callers, as specified by the parameter; if complete exception information is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完整的异常信息包括确切的服务器异常信息和服务器堆栈跟踪信息。Complete exception information includes the exact server exception and the server stack trace. 筛选后的信息包括标准的远程异常信息，但不包括服务器堆栈跟踪信息。Filtered information includes a standard remoting exception but no server stack trace. `CustomErrorsEnabled`方法反映中指定的配置设置`mode`属性``的应用程序配置文件的元素。The `CustomErrorsEnabled` method reflects configuration settings that were specified in the `mode` attribute of the `` element of the application configuration file. 有关配置选项的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92c0c097-d984-4315-835b-7490ecdf1097)。For more information about configuration options, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92c0c097-d984-4315-835b-7490ecdf1097). 下表显示三个服务器通道指定的调用方收到的异常信息以及它们接收的信息的类型的属性值。The following table shows the three server channel property values that specify which callers receive exception information and what type of information they receive. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`off`|所有调用方均收到完整的异常信息。All callers receive complete exception information.| |`on`|所有调用方均收到筛选后的异常信息。All callers receive filtered exception information.| |`remoteOnly`|本地调用方收到完整的异常信息，远程调用方收到筛选后的异常信息。Local callers receive complete exception information; remote callers receive filtered exception information.| 下表显示的交互`isLocalRequest`参数和服务器通道属性。The following table shows the interaction of the `isLocalRequest` parameter and the server channel property. |“值”Value|isLocalRequestisLocalRequest|返回值Return value|描述Description| |-----------|--------------------|------------------|-----------------| |`on`|`true`|`true`|本地调用方均收到筛选后的异常信息。Local callers receive filtered exception information.| |`on`|`false`|`true`|远程调用方均收到筛选后的异常信息。Remote callers receive filtered exception information.| |`off`|`true`|`false`|本地调用方均收到完整的异常信息。Local callers receive complete exception information.| |`off`|`false`|`false`|远程调用方均收到完整的异常信息。Remote callers receive complete exception information.| |`remoteOnly`|`true`|`false`|本地调用方均收到完整的异常信息。Local callers receive complete exception information.| |`remoteOnly`|`false`|`true`|远程调用方均收到筛选后的异常信息。Remote callers receive filtered exception information.| 有关使用应用程序配置文件来控制返回给调用方的异常信息的信息，请参阅``元素。For information about using application configuration files to control the return of exception information to callers, see the `` element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已知的对象类型可以是单个调用或单一实例。Well-known object types can be either single call or singleton. 如果对象类型是单个调用，则它的新实例被创建每次从客户端调用传入中时。If an object type is single call, then a new instance of it is created each time a call from the client comes in. 由该对象的一个实例处理对单一实例对象的所有调用。All calls to a singleton object are handled by one instance of that object. 有关的已知对象的更多详细说明，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396)。For a more detailed description of well-known objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396). ## Examples [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration_GetRegisteredWellKnownClient_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_GetRegisteredWellKnownClient_Client/CPP/remotingconfiguration_getregisteredwellknownclient_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration_GetRegisteredWellKnownClient_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_GetRegisteredWellKnownClient_Client/CS/remotingconfiguration_getregisteredwellknownclient_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration_GetRegisteredWellKnownClient_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_GetRegisteredWellKnownClient_Client/VB/remotingconfiguration_getregisteredwellknownclient_client.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在服务器上创建客户端激活对象的实例，你必须知道其，并且它必须注册的服务器端上使用方法。To create an instance of a client-activated object on the server, you must know its and it must be registered on the server end by using the method. 若要获取的客户端激活对象的新实例的代理，将客户端必须首先注册具有通道通过调用，再激活对象`new`。To obtain a proxy for a new instance of the client-activated object, the client must first register a channel with and then activate the object by calling `new`. 若要激活的客户端激活对象类型`new`关键字，你必须先注册上客户端最终使用的对象类型方法。To activate a client-activated object type with the `new` keyword, you must first register the object type on the client end using the method. 调用方法提供的远程处理基础结构远程应用程序的位置其中`new`尝试创建它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote application where `new` attempts to create it. 另一方面，如果您使用方法创建的新实例的客户端激活对象，则必须提供远程应用程序的 URL 作为参数，因此不不必要的客户端上注册任何之前。If, on the other hand, you use the method to create a new instance of the client-activated object, you must supply the remote application's URL as a parameter, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 若要提供方法替换为你想要创建对象的服务器的 URL，你必须将封装的实例中的 URL类。To supply the method with the URL of the server where you want to create the object, you must encapsulate the URL in an instance of the class. 有关客户端激活的对象的详细说明，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a)。For a detailed description of client-activated objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在服务器上创建客户端激活对象的实例，你必须知道其，并且它必须注册的服务器端上使用方法。To create an instance of a client-activated object on the server, you must know its and it must be registered on the server end by using the method. 若要获取的客户端激活对象的新实例的代理，将客户端必须首先注册具有通道通过调用，再激活对象`new`。To obtain a proxy for a new instance of the client-activated object, the client must first register a channel with and then activate the object by calling `new`. 若要激活的客户端激活对象类型`new`关键字，你必须先注册上客户端最终使用的对象类型方法。To activate a client-activated object type with the `new` keyword, you must first register the object type on the client end using the method. 调用方法提供的远程处理基础结构远程应用程序的位置其中`new`尝试创建它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote application where `new` attempts to create it. 另一方面，如果您使用方法创建的新实例的客户端激活对象，则必须提供远程应用程序的 URL 作为参数，因此不不必要的客户端上注册任何之前。If, on the other hand, you use the method to create a new instance of the client-activated object, you must supply the remote application's URL as a parameter, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 若要提供方法替换为你想要创建对象的服务器的 URL，你必须将封装的实例中的 URL类。To supply the method with the URL of the server where you want to create the object, you must encapsulate the URL in an instance of the class. 有关客户端激活的对象的详细说明，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a)For a detailed description of client-activated objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a) ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何作为一种类型，才能激活服务器上的注册客户端上的对象类型。The following code example demonstrates registration of an object type on the client end as a type that can be activated on the server. 有关的服务器代码中对应于所提供的客户端代码，请参阅示例方法。For the server code that corresponds to the presented client code, see the example for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在服务器上创建客户端激活对象的实例，你必须知道其，并且它必须注册的服务器端上使用方法。To create an instance of a client-activated object on the server, you must know its and it must be registered on the server end by using the method. 若要获取的客户端激活对象的新实例的代理，将客户端必须首先注册具有通道通过调用，再激活对象`new`或。To obtain a proxy for a new instance of the client-activated object, the client must first register a channel with and then activate the object by calling `new` or . 若要激活的客户端激活对象类型`new`关键字，你必须先注册上客户端最终使用的对象类型方法。To activate a client-activated object type with the `new` keyword, you must first register the object type on the client end using the method. 调用方法提供的远程处理基础结构的位置的远程应用程序，其中`new`尝试创建它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote application, where `new` attempts to create it. 另一方面，如果您使用方法创建的新实例的客户端激活对象，则必须提供远程应用程序的 URL 作为参数，因此不不必要的客户端上注册任何之前。If, on the other hand, you use the method to create a new instance of the client-activated object, you must supply the remote application's URL as a parameter, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 若要提供方法替换为你想要创建对象的服务器的 URL，你必须将封装的实例中的 URL类。To supply the method with the URL of the server where you want to create the object, you must encapsulate the URL in an instance of the class. 有关客户端激活的对象的详细说明，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a)。For a detailed description of client-activated objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何作为一种类型，可以通过客户端激活的注册的服务器上的对象类型。The following code example demonstrates registration of an object type on the server as a type that can be activated by the client. 对应于所提供的服务器代码的客户端代码，请参阅示例方法。For the client code that corresponds to the presented server code, see the example for the method. summary.span: 将在客户端提供的 中记录的对象 注册为可在服务器上激活的已知类型。

span.span: Registers an object recorded in the provided on the client end as a well-known type that can be activated on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 知道已注册的已知对象的任何的 URI 客户端可以通过注册使用其首选的信道获取的对象的代理，并通过调用激活对象`new`或。Any client that knows the URI of a registered well-known object can obtain a proxy for the object by registering the channel it prefers with , and activating the object by calling `new` or . 若要激活的已知对象与`new`，您必须首先注册使用的客户端上的已知对象类型方法。To activate a well-known object with `new`, you must first register the well-known object type on the client using the method. 调用方法提供的远程处理基础结构允许的远程对象的位置`new`关键字创建它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote object, which allows the `new` keyword to create it. 另一方面，如果您使用方法来激活的已知对象，你必须提供给该对象的 URL 作为自变量，因此需要在客户端没有预先注册。If, on the other hand, you use the method to activate the well-known object, you must supply it with the object's URL as an argument, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 有关的已知对象的详细说明，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396)。For a detailed description of well-known objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396).

span.span: Registers an object recorded in the provided on the service end as a well-known type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 知道已注册的已知对象的任何的 URI 客户端可以通过注册使用其首选的信道获取的对象的代理，并通过调用激活对象`new`或方法。Any client that knows the URI of a registered well-known object can obtain a proxy for the object by registering the channel it prefers with , and activating the object by calling `new` or the method. 若要激活的已知对象与`new`，您必须首先注册使用的客户端上的已知对象类型方法。To activate a well-known object with `new`, you must first register the well-known object type on the client using the method. 调用方法提供的远程处理基础结构允许的远程对象的位置`new`关键字创建它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote object, which allows the `new` keyword to create it. 另一方面，如果您使用方法来激活的已知对象，你必须提供给该对象的 URL 作为自变量，因此需要在客户端没有预先注册。If, on the other hand, you use the method to activate the well-known object, you must supply it with the object's URL as an argument, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 当调用到达服务器时，.NET Framework 从消息中提取 URI 时，检查要找到匹配的 URI，，然后实例化必要时，该对象的对象的引用的远程处理表转发到对象的方法调用。When the call arrives at the server, the .NET Framework extracts the URI from the message, examines the remoting tables to locate the reference for the object that matches the URI, and then instantiates the object if necessary, forwarding the method call to the object. 如果对象注册为，方法调用完成后销毁它。If the object is registered as , it is destroyed after the method call is completed. 每个方法调用创建对象的新实例。A new instance of the object is created for each method called. 之间的唯一区别和`new`是前者允许你指定的 URL 作为参数，而后者从配置获取 URL。The only difference between and `new` is that the former allows you to specify a URL as a parameter, and the latter obtains the URL from the configuration. 远程对象本身不是通过注册过程中实例化。The remote object itself is not instantiated by the registration process. 这仅情况当客户端试图对对象调用方法，或从客户端激活该对象。This only happens when a client attempts to call a method on the object or activates the object from the client side. 有关的已知对象的详细说明，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396)。For a detailed description of well-known objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396). ## Examples
